mapper.select: /* UserMapper.selectOrderItemByUserId */ select a.order_item_id as orderItemId , b.goods_id as goodsId , b.goods_name as goodsName , a.order_price as goodsPrice , a.order_status as orderStatus , a.reg_datetime as goodsBuyDate from order_item a left join goods b on a.goods_id = b.goods_id where a.del_yn = 'N' and a.user_id = #{userId}

/* UserMapper.selectTourismScheduleByUserId */ select a.tourism_api_id as tourismApiId , b.mapy as mapy , b.mapx as mapx , a.schedule_date as scheduleDate , b.addr1 as addr , b.title as title , d.file_url as fileUrl from tourism_schedule a left join tourism_api b on a.tourism_api_id = b.tourism_api_id left join file_group c on b.file_group_id = c.file_group_id left join file d on c.file_group_id = d.file_group_id where a.del_yn = 'N' and b.del_yn = 'N' and a.user_id = #{userId}

/* UserMapper.selectUserCartByUserId */ select a.goods_id as goodsId , d.file_url as fileUrl , b.goods_name as goodsName , b.goods_price as goodsPrice , a.order_count as orderCount from user_cart a left join goods b on a.goods_id = b.goods_id left join file_group c on b.file_group_id = c.file_group_id left join file d on c.file_group_id = d.file_group_id where a.del_yn = 'N' and b.del_yn = 'N' and a.user_id = #{userId}
